name: This Is Beyond Science
one_liner: A reaction image featuring an Indian man saying 'This is beyond science' to describe something inexplicable.
meaning: When something occurs that defies all known laws of physics, logic, or common sense.
remix_rules: Used for both tech glitches and real life anomalies
example_lines: How the check cleared so fast? This is beyond science
Logic went out the window, past the limit of the lab
